question: The 61st National Shooting Championship at National Games Shooting Range has been hosted by ___________.
explanation: The 61st National Shooting Championship at National Games Shooting Range was held in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. J itu Rai shot 10.8 on his 24th shot and won gold medal. He also created a new national record score of 233. In the final, Omkar Singh from the Navy and Jai Singh from the Army won silver and bronze medals respectively.
